text: Die Lit is the first studio album by American rapper Playboi Carti. Die Lit was released on May 11, 2018. The album was first teased by Pi'erre Bourne in March 2018. The promotional single "Love Hurts" featuring Travis Scott was released through Carti's SoundCloud on May 2, 2018. The album cover was revealed by ASAP Rocky on May 10, 2018. It was taken by Nick Walker and features Carti giving double middle fingers while flipping into a moshpit. The photo is based on a reference photo from an old punk rock show. The album debuted at #3 on the Billboard 200, selling 61,000 album-equivalent units. Die Lit would be certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). ==Songs== ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:Debut albums
title: Die Lit
